column1: Dodger is a full-blooded Scotch terrier. His eyes are the brightest of all bright eyes; and he acts just as one might suppose from his name. He dodges here and there
column5: and sometimes puts his paws up on the baby's cradle.The other day
column6: the baby's red sock dropped off from his foot; and Dodger slyly picked it up
column8: going to a corner of the room
column9: ate off the red tassels that were on it. I don't think he will do it again; for he did not act as though they tasted very good.Dodger has many cunning ways. He will bring his master's slippers
column12: and do many other funny things. Just now his master is trying to teach him to shut a door.
